title: Front Row at the Thom Browne Fall 2026 Show
desc: Queen Latifah, Alix Earle, Teyana Taylor and more attend the GQ Bowl presents Thom Browne Fall 2026 fashion show in San Francisco.

title: ‘No end in sight’ to Britain’s wet weather as dozens of flood warnings issued
desc: Met Office forecasts more rainfall to continue UK’s 37-day run, and flooding expected especially in south-west England and Midlands

title: Man arrested after reports of criminal damage in Wexford
desc: A man in his 50s has been arrested after an axe was used to damage a number of cars in Co Wexford.

title: Address issue wisely and tactfully, Zahid urges all parties
desc: SEREMBAN: All parties must address the issue of illegal houses of worship wisely and tactfully, says Datuk Seri Dr Ahmad Zahid Hamidi (pic).

title: Australia news live: standoff over site of Isaac Herzog protest continues as more than 3,000 NSW police to monitor Israeli president’s Sydney visit
KLF 2026 puts economy under the microscope
desc: Economists, policymakers call for structural reforms to reset Pakistan's economy

title: Queensland government announces hate speech reforms including banned slogans and symbols
desc: The laws to be introduced in parliament this week will ban the phrases "globalise the intifada" and "from the river to the sea", as well as offensive symbols.

title: SpaceX Crew-12 will Study How Microgravity Affects the Human Body
desc: NASA’s SpaceX Crew-12 mission is preparing to launch for a long-duration science mission aboard the International Space Station. During the mission, select crew members will participate in human health studies focused on understanding how astronauts’ bodies adapt to the low-gravity environment of space, including a new study examining subtle changes in blood flow.

title: From prison cell to PhD and palace date: Malik’s journey of hope
desc: Convicted of murder while a minor, the Sabahan spent 24 years in prison and pulled himself out of the darkness by 'hitting the books' until he earned a doctorate and a royal pardon.

title: Kairakau residents still on Level 4 water restrictions nearly two months after implementation
desc: Kairakau residents have now spent nearly two months under Level 4 water restrictions, with strict limits still in place as the small coastal Hawke’s Bay...
